Verses: 1 dhevan Illai Endru Madhikettavan Than Irudhayaththil Sollikkollugiraan. Avargal Thangalaik Keduththu, Aruvaruppaana Kiriyaigalai Seydhuvarugiraargal; Nanmai Seygiravan Oruvanum Illai.
2 dhevanaith Thedugira Unarvullavan Undo Endru Paarkka, Karththar Paralogaththilirundhu Manubuththiraraik Kannokkinaar.
3 ellaarum Vazhivilagi, Egamaaik Kettupponaargal; Nanmai Seygiravan Illai, Oruvanaagilum Illai.
4 akkiramakkaararil Oruvanukkum Arivu Illaiyo? Appaththaip Patchikkiradhupola, En Janaththaip Patchikkiraargale; Avargal Karththaraith Thozhudhukollugiradhillai.
5 ange Avargal Migavum Bayandhaargal; Dhevan Needhimaanudaiya Sandhadhiyode Irukkiraare.
6 sirumaippattavanukkuk Karththar Adaikkalamaayirukkiraar Endru Solli, Neengal Avanudaiya Aalosanaiyai Alatchiyampannineergal.
7 seeyonilirundhu Isravelukku Ratchippu Varuvadhaaga; Karththar Thammudaiya Janaththin Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppumbodhu Yaakkobukkuk Kalippum, Isravelukku Magizhchchiyum Undaagum.
